name: A Scenic Route
description:
Inspired by A Scenic Route by Harlan Ellsion. Developed for the Wizard Jam 10. 

Pretty bare bones duel between two cars without sound or reason.

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Space Fighter Loop" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
